description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 3 modes: EASYTWIN (classic twinstick shooter), HURTTWIN (twinstick shooter with a defend and rescue twist), TRUETWIN (two characters on screen at once with each controlled independently with the analog sticks). True twinstick action like never before.  Many and varied enemy types, weapons, play styles, and backgrounds.  Personal high score tracking to find out if your getting better or worse.
